name: ucreate-signatures
description: 1. Setup Heroku first 2. Install Heroku CLI 3. Clone this repo 4. Login to you Heroku account and project (instruction on the Herocu Docs) 5. Make changes in the `index.php` file for layout changes 6. Update `data.json` with new people onboard 7. Push changes to Heroku: `git push heroku master` 8. Done
